tool_description:
NewsFoldr revolutionizes the way you access global news. Our API connects you to over 30,000 trusted news sources worldwide, delivering real-time updates and a wealth of historical news content. With NewsFoldr, stay informed with the latest developments across various sectors and regions, all through a single, streamlined API.

Key Features:

Expansive News Network: Gain insights from a range of sources, including major outlets like BBC, CNN, and The New York Times, as well as regional news p...
name: NewsFoldr - The Ultimate News Aggregation Hub
title: NewsFoldr - The Ultimate News Aggregation Hub
tool_name: NewsFoldr - The Ultimate News Aggregation Hub

api_list.name: /popular
api_list.description: This endpoint returns a paginated list of the most popular trending stories.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://newsfoldr-the-ultimate-news-aggregation-hub.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "newsfoldr-the-ultimate-news-aggregation-hub.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
